hero.title: Welcome
hero.content: There's two great hobbies in my life: lifeguarding and software engineering. I've even managed to make the latter my work. In this small sites you'll find presentations on both subjects.

lifeguarding.title: Lifeguarding
lifeguarding.content: Presentations regarding lifesaver and lifeguarding trainings

ow.title: Lifeguard Open Water & Beach
ow.content: The presentations belonging to the training (junio/senior) lifeguard and specialisations

lifesaver.title: Lifesaver
lifesaver.content: The presentations belonging to the training lifesaver 2 & 3

incidents.title: Major incidents
incidents.content: Learn how the Dutch emergency services communicate and handle during major incidents

frontend.title: Web Development
frontend.content: Talks on UI/UX and techniques like ReactJS, HTML, Tailwind, etc.

backend.title: Backend
backend.content: Talks on API's, clean architecture, microservices and techniques like Java (Spring) and PHP.

disasters.title: Major incidents
disasters.subtitle: and how the Dutch emergency services handles them

introduction.title: Introduction & the Dutch Lifesaving Federation
introduction.content: Welcome to the theory classes. Check this section for the schedules and in introduction to the lifeguard associations.

safety.title: Swimming skill, safety awareness and self-rescue
safety.content: In this section we look into the importance of self-rescue and swimming skills. Besides that we'll have a look at safety awareness and the risks of swimming.

skills.title: Knowledge and skills
skills.content: This sections focuses on different types of rescue, recognizing a person in distress and rendering first aid.

aid.title: The course of a rescue
aid.content: The last section takes you trough the course of a rescue and what your role as a lifesaver could be.

planning.title: Planning
planning.intro: De content of the theory is divided into these lessons:

associations.title: Dutch Lifeguard Federation: organisation and activities

lifesaver.title: The roles and responsibilities of a lifesaver

safety.title: Swimming skills, safety awareness and self-rescue

skills.title: Knowledge and skills for a safe rescue

rescue.title: The rescue in case of an emergency
